alert.note: Alert for East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 13 at 12:48PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami, East Polk and North Clearwater Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Polk; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater
